title: "Generalizability of deep learning models for dental image analysis"
excerpt: "We assessed the generalizability of deep learning models and how to improve it. Our exemplary use-case was the detection of apical lesions on panoramic radiographs. We employed two datasets of panoramic radiographs from two centers,"
